# Problem 3

```{r}
n = 30
sd = 5

mean_list = list(0,1,2,3,4,5,6)

dataset = function(x) {
  rnorm(n, x, sd)}

output = vector("list", length = 5000)
final = vector("list", length = 5000)

for (i in 1:5000) {
  output[[i]] = dataset(0)
  a = broom::tidy(t.test(output[[i]]))
  final[[i]] = c(a[[1]],a[[3]])
}
```
